amendatorysection.catchline: Adjacent exchange; certificate of convenience and necessity.
amendatorysection.para: After the commission has lawfully granted an application pursuant to section 86-136, the telecommunications company ordered to provide the exchange telephone service shall be issued a certificate of convenience and necessity to serve that portion of the territory added to its exchange service area by the commission. The commission shall set the date when the exchange telephone service granted shall take effect and, in doing so, shall take into consideration any construction or major repair which will be required of the telecommunications company involved.
